"Get Info" "MeetingActivity" "I don't care" "Previous" "Next" "Back to main" "+100" "+10" "+1" "-1" "-10" "-100" "Daily Times" "News" "Days to settle:" "Short sales are settled at day start." "Quick Game" "About" "SplashActivity" "StockXChange2" "DevLog" "Buy" "shares" "There are no info tips at this point." "All is well" "Starting Term" "Nothing to report" "Extra:" "Invitation to a party" "You received an Invitation to a party. Attending will cost $" ".00 and you will earn" " assets. What do you want to do?" "Accept" "Decline" "USER " "The %1$s company" "is related to shady activities." "is not involved in illegal activities." "share price is expected to increase." "share price is expected to decrease" "Company %1$s suddendly declared bankruptcy today.

The authorities state that the Company was found to be involved in shady activities, and the CEO was placed under arrest." "Company Bankrupts" "A Pump and Dump scheme was executed today, leaving %1$s shareholders in a tight situation, counting losses.

Law enforcement agencies are conducting an investigation to locate the person or persons responsible." "Stock Scheme leaves brokers in despair" "A Short and Distort scheme was executed today, leaving %1$s in a tight situation, counting losses.

Law enforcement agencies are conducting an investigation to locate the person or persons responsible." "A company in distress" "Company %1$s suddendly declared bankruptcy today. The authorities state that the Company was found to be involved in a Ponzi Scheme, and the CEO was placed under arrest." "Company %1$s was found to be in violation of multiple laws and regulations. The results of the investigation, published by authorities, indicate corruption at the highest levels of the company, and the govemnment has already taken action." "Finance world shaken" "Day Started" "Earthquake" "An EarthQuake of Magnitude %1$f has been reported." "Typhoon" "A Typhoon of Category %1$f has hit our area." "Explosion" "An explosion has been reported. The authorities are investigating the causes" "Riots" "There are reports of riots in the city center. Citizens are advised to avoid the area." "WAR" "An invasion on our territory signals the start of a War. All armed forces have mobilized to deal with the invasion." "Used Asset to escape Bankrupty" "GAME OVER" "You have been arrested after amassing a tremendous amount of debt.

You have lost the game." "OK" "Credits" ""This game is the first work created by an independent developer. I hope you enjoyed it.

Images come from free stock images sites (like Pixabay).

Launch Image/Icon by Katrina.Tuliao - http://www.flickr.com/photos/thewalkingirony/3051500551/

Bell sound recorded by Brylon Terry.

This game is and will remain free and open source.

If you liked it, please leave a good review.

Bugs and recomendations at
swilliammccoy@gmail.com
bill.fragkas@gmail.com"" "Quick Game" "The quick game option is useful for seeing what a level 5 player is like, and enjoy the full game, without fear of altering the saved data. It is not recommended for new players. Proceed?" "Go" "New Game" ""Proceeding will erase all of your data and progress except your full assets.

You will start again at level 1 with $10000 and nothing owned.

You will also lose any part-gained assets.

Are you sure you want to proceed?"" "NO" "Not possible in Quick Game" "Quit" "Do you want to exit the game?" "Exit" "Economic Boom" "The government officials report that the economy is Booming, and great profit is to be made in the foreseable future, in all Industries." "Economy Accelerates" "The government officials report that the future of our economy is bright, and companies can expect above average profits." "Economic Reccess" "The government officials report that the economy not doing very well, and companies should steer carefully to avoid losses." "Depression" "Economy is going from bad to worse, and government officials are discussing possible actions to help the economy recover." New Info
"
